testcase.name: deleteBoardingGroup

error.message: ### Error updating database. Cause: java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`bookingservice`.`boardinggroup`, CONSTRAINT `boardinggroup_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`flight_id`) REFERENCES `flights` (`flight_id`)) ### The error may exist in mappers/BoardingGroupMapper.xml ### The error may involve booking.mybatis.mappers.BoardingGroupMapper.create-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: INSERT INTO boardinggroup (flight_id, `group`, position) VALUES (?, ?, ?) ### Cause: java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`bookingservice`.`boardinggroup`, CONSTRAINT `boardinggroup_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`flight_id`) REFERENCES `flights` (`flight_id`))
